results.title: Toxicity of Atenolol and Propranolol on Rat Heart Mitochondria.
results.text_hl: Mitochondria as one of the most important sources of @CHEMICAL_Reactive_Oxygen_Species @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017382 @@@ROS@@@ are considered as one of the targets of drug-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiotoxicity@@@. The aim of this study was to evaluate the effects of @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on mitochondria isolated from the heart.

citations.NLM: Seydi E, Tabbati Y, Pourahmad J. Toxicity of Atenolol and Propranolol on Rat Heart Mitochondria. Drug Res (Stuttg). 2020 Apr;70(4):151-157. PMID: 32120430
citations.BibTeX: @article{32120430, title={Toxicity of Atenolol and Propranolol on Rat Heart Mitochondria.}, author={Seydi E and Tabbati Y and Pourahmad J}, journal={Drug Res (Stuttg)}, volume={70}, number={4}, pages={151-157}}

results.title: The effects of extracellular ions on beta-blocker cardiotoxicity.
results.text_hl: The intent of this study was to determine if modifying extracellular ions would reverse @<m>DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiotoxicity@@@ from two beta-blockers: @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@PROP@@@) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@ATEN@@@).

citations.NLM: Kerns W 2nd, Ransom M, Tomaszewski C, Kline J, Raymond R. The effects of extracellular ions on beta-blocker cardiotoxicity. Toxicol Appl Pharmacol. 1996 Mar;137(1):1-7. PMID: 8607134
citations.BibTeX: @article{8607134, title={The effects of extracellular ions on beta-blocker cardiotoxicity.}, author={Kerns W 2nd and Ransom M and Tomaszewski C and Kline J and Raymond R}, journal={Toxicol Appl Pharmacol}, volume={137}, number={1}, pages={1-7}}

results.title: Effect of melatonin and atenolol on carbon monoxide cardiotoxicity: an experimental study in rats.
results.text_hl: Effect of @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Carbon_Monoxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002248 @@@carbon monoxide@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiotoxicity@@@: an experimental study in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Combined effects of quercetin and atenolol in reducing isoproterenol-induced cardiotoxicity in rats: possible mediation through scavenging free radicals.
results.text_hl: Combined effects of @CHEMICAL_Quercetin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011794 @@@quercetin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in reducing @CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@isoproterenol@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiotoxicity@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@: possible mediation through scavenging @CHEMICAL_Free_Radicals @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005609 @@@free radicals@@@.

results.title: Effect of aged garlic extract and s-allyl cysteine and their interaction with atenolol during isoproterenol induced myocardial toxicity in rats
results.text_hl: These results suggest augmentation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@'s cardioprotective effect by @GENE_RENBP @GENE_81759 @@@AGE@@@ / @CHEMICAL_S_allylcysteine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065299 @@@SAC@@@ during @CHEMICAL_Isoproterenol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007545 @@@isoproterenol@@@ induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiotoxicity@@@.
